activities: Chatham's clients are commercial businesses.  We store only the minimum amount of business and employee information required to permit clients' employees to access and use Chatham's services.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Organization human resource data (offline and online); name and contact information provided by clients (offline and online)
recoursemech: For organization human resources data:, EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commission (FDPIC); For all other types of data: BBB EU Safe Harbor
